Perceptor:

"No wait" replied Perceptor "This is a good info, thwe info that 
perhaps we're seeking, check the picture that I'll send you" 
Perceptor sent the picture "I'll give you a suggesttion in order we 
can capture this bot, Flicker, you have to become a good friend of 
Rodimus and this bot and find out... thier relationship... after they 
trust in you, you can use your friendly influence to lead this bot to 
a tramp, only if the bot is close to Rodimus Prime, in other way not 
be very useful, got it?"

OOC: Check your mail Carhead.
